txt.en: You ask if Frethi saw the strange figure.\n\n'No, I saw nothing. Are you feeling all right, friend?'
'Just look at this place.... It is truly ancient!'
'Five pedestals and a crown? Let me see if I can read some of these runes....'
'Mi agkâkhu Uzlaf Binamrâd.... By Durin's beard! Could this chamber be from First Age? From Durin the Deathless's time?'
Frethi is ready to begin exploring the chamber.\n\nYou should talk to Frethi.
'I do not want to hear your excuses! You must stand before the King! Now!'
You have found an ancient chamber deep beneath Moria. What secrets lie within?

'What in Durin's name have we found here? There are no records of this place! I had thought the only thing we might find down this far was the Stair itself, but... perhaps I was wrong! Let us look around!'
